itunes:title: Genesis Week 2 with Rebekah Lyons
title: Genesis Week 2 with Rebekah Lyons
description:
On this episode of the She Reads Truth podcast, Raechel and Amanda are joined by bestselling author, speaker, wife, and mama of four, Rebekah Lyons. The trio talks about everything from the Tower of Babel to their mutual love for dark chocolate-covered almonds. As they dig deep into the second week of our Genesis study, they explore God’s calling of unlikely men and women, the joy that comes from using Scripture to interpret Scripture, and why rhythms are better than resolutions.  

Read with Us: 

This episode corresponds to Week 2 of the She Reads Truth Genesis: Back to the Beginning reading plan found on the She Reads Truth app and SheReadsTruth.com. 

Shop the Genesis collection at ShopSheReadsTruth.com 

Save 15% on our Lent 2020 Collection when you use the code LENT15.

Show notes can be found at shereadstruth.com/podcast/genesis-week-2
